attributes.additional_details: To work legally in the UK you already need to prove your ID which we have many forms of. You also need a National Insurance number which we have. This was not stated in Labours election campaign and, everything that was stated and voted for has failed. Illegal migrants have no need to work as they currently have everything paid for them from food to accommodation. Why would they want to work? Instead, stop the all inclusive lifestyle and make it known it is no more. The boats will stop.
attributes.background: We want to put an end to the Digital ID scheme that Sir Keir Starmer is enforcing onto the people of the United Kingdom. This is nothing more than a control measure being enforced onto the people all whilst being touted as a means to stop illegal migration into the country,

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730194
